# Usage:
# $ wave_name
# num_ms_to_appear pos_y speed health

$ Wave_1
1000 540 1 4
4000 140 1 4
0 540 1 4
0 940 1 4
12000 740 2 4
0 340 2 4
5000 540 2 4
4000 140 2 4
0 540 2 4
0 940 2 4

$ Wave_2
1000 540 1 6
4000 140 1 6
0 540 1 6
0 940 1 6
12000 740 2 6
0 340 2 6
5000 540 2 6
4000 140 2 6
0 540 2 6
0 940 2 6

$ Wave_3
1000 540 3 8
3000 540 3 8
3000 400 3 8
0 680 3 8
